      • createInventory

        protected abstract IInventory createInventory(int size,
                                              String name)
        Create actual inventory.
        Parameters:
        size - size of inventory. Must be multiple of 9.
        name - name of the inventory. This is the raw name, so the implemented method has to translate color code and and underscore appropriately.
        Returns:
        the inventory

        Parameters:
        name - this can contain color code &, but you should specify exact name for the title.
        Returns:
